pkgmetadata.longdescription: Convex Partition Optimisation // Convex Partition is a black-box optimisation algorithm for single objective real-parameters functions. The basic principle is to progressively estimate and exploit a regression tree similar to a CART (Classification and Regression Tree) of the objective function. For more details see 'de Paz' (2024) doi:10.1007/978-3-031-62836-8_3 and 'Loh' (2011) doi:10.1002/widm.8 .
